Module Contents

.. py:class:: BitMask

   Bit masks for various purposes


   .. py:attribute:: LOW_1_BIT
      :value: 1



   .. py:attribute:: LOW_2_BITS
      :value: 3



   .. py:attribute:: LOW_4_BITS
      :value: 15



   .. py:attribute:: LOW_7_BITS
      :value: 127



   .. py:attribute:: FULL_BYTE
      :value: 255



   .. py:attribute:: HIGH_4_BITS
      :value: 240



   .. py:attribute:: WORD
      :value: 65535
